Translations.Text: aap keh dijiye ke aye kaafiro
na main ibaadath karta hoon, us ki jis ki tum ibaadath karte ho
na tum ibaadath karne waale ho, us ki jis ki main ibaadath karta hoon
aur na main ibaadath karonga, jis ki tum ibaadath karte ho
aur na tum us ki ibaadath karne waale ho, jis ki main ibaadath kar raha hoon
tumhaare liye tumhaara deen hai aur mere liye mera deen hai
jab Allah ki madad aur fateh aa jaaye
aur tu logo ko Allah ke deen mein jauq dar jauq ata dekh le
tu apne rab ki tasbih karne lag, hamd ke saath aur us se maghfirath ki dua maang, beshak wo bada hee tauba qubool karne waala hai
abu lahab ke duno haath toot gaye aur wo (khud) halaak ho gaya
na to us ka maal us ke kaam aaya aur na us ki kamaayi
wo an qareeb bhadakne waali aag mein jayega
aur us ki biwi bhi (jayegi) jo lakdiyaa dho-ne waali hai
us ki gardan mein posth khajoor ki bati hoyi rassi hogi
